price: 54. Puis quand Il éloigne de vous le mal, certains d’entre vous ne Lui en prêtent pas moins des associés.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma idhā kashafa al-ḍura ʿankum idhā farīqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikūna
